issue.title: [CF 1171] TellMeWhen Addon /CancelAura on Icon
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create icon utilizing proc. of trinket Soul Capacitor (Spirit Shift)
2. Somehow script the right click of the icon proc (TELLMEWHEN ICON) to /cancelaura Spirit Shift
3. Test and ensure it works...

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect the /cancelaura macro to work so I can pop the trinket and do my damage when I want it to pop.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v7.4.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No, I tried every scripting method and cannot figure out how to do it.  Even tried a little LUI coding.  You should have a special conditional to call a macro on a right click event.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

I appreciate all effort in trying to fix this issue for me, it has caused me several headaches the past hour trying to tweak my UI utilizing this feature.


> Posted by CurseForge user sk8onin | Imported from CurseForge issue #1171 | Raw

comments.body:
This is not possible and never will be due to Blizzard's restrictions on what addons can do.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
